title: Tomato Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta, cook onions and tomatoes, mix together.

title: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Fry chicken, add veggies and sauce, cook together.

title: Veggie Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs, cook with veggies, fold and serve.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef, fill taco shells with beef and veggies.

title: Fruit Salad
instructions: Chop fruits, mix together, serve chilled.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread, place cheese in between, grill until golden.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing and croutons.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Mix ingredients, scoop onto baking sheet, bake until golden.

title: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Chop veggies, simmer in broth until tender.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix ingredients, pour onto skillet, flip when bubbles form.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti, brown beef, mix with sauce and serve.

title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Layer mozzarella and tomato, drizzle with olive oil and basil.

title: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook beef and mushrooms, stir in sour cream, serve over noodles.
